** what's the death match **
Death match what give our game it's special than other game and it what give you a ride with your car and this car have gun to play with it at online with your friends and all people and used this gun to destroy other car

** full custom from a-z **
This game have a full custom from the unlimited color for your car paint and shining with your favorite reflections also you can customize the wheel scale and suspension to make your car higher and lower as you like and you can change your car drift as you like with the power drift changer and also you can change your smoke colors on the drift.

** video recording **
One of our function in a game is that you may record your drifting and share your video at network and watch it on every play website.

** how i can get money to buy cars**
You may get money at tow choose first one is you can buy a coins and then sell your dream cars and modify on it then you can show it to your friends throw network and second choose is that you collect drift score and get amount of money for each score.

** what's special on our game **
- Death match because it's the first game give this option and online.

- Full color customized for your car from car paint to rim paint and smoke color

- Wheel scale custom
- Drift power custom to give your car the drift power you like to be in.

- suspension custom for your car
